docs.snippet: A Florida golfer made the shot of his life with a putter when he used it to escape an alligator that had grabbed him by the ankle....
docs.lead_paragraph: A Florida golfer made the shot of his life with a putter when he used it to escape an alligator that had grabbed him by the ankle.

headline.main: Golfer Uses Putter to Escape Gator's Jaws

docs.snippet: “Jaws,” a seminal blockbuster, is now out in a Blu-ray edition....
docs.lead_paragraph: “Jaws,” a seminal blockbuster, is now out in a Blu-ray edition.
docs.abstract: Stephen Spielberg's summer blockbuster Jaws, which has now been restored and reissued on Blu-ray, changed the nature of American moviegoing in 1975 with an intensive television advertising campaign and by opening in 400 theaters nationwide, allowing almost everyone to see the film as soon as it came out.

headline.main: Oh, Bruce, What Teeth You Have
headline.print_headline: Oh, Bruce, What Teeth You Have

docs.abstract: The Black List, an annual look at the best unproduced scripts in circulation, includes two retellings of the making of “Jaws” and two stories involving Mr. Rogers.

docs.snippet: No Fig Leaves, Please     Naked is not the same as being unclothed. At least not in the art world....
docs.lead_paragraph: No Fig Leaves, Please Naked is not the same as being unclothed. At least not in the art world.
docs.abstract: Controversy erupts over unclothed bronze statue of Greek mythology huntress Atalanta by Paul Manship outside Hofstra Stadium in Hempstead, NY; East Hampton Town Planning Department sets June 2 meeting to discuss actor Robert DeNiro's request to place hot tub outside his home; Frank Mundus, said to be model for shark hunter in film Jaws, will offer shark-fishing trips from Montauk Yacht Club during June; photos (M)

headline.main: At Hofstra, a Statue Unclothed, or Is It Naked?

docs.snippet: Mr. Taylor, an Australian marine conservationist, helped film some of the most terrifying moments in American film, as a scientist suspended in an iron cage under water is attacked by a 26-foot Great White that bends the cage wide open....

docs.snippet: The semifinals of the Vanderbilt Knockout Team Championship here today at the American Contract Bridge League's Spring Nationals had an international flavor. Three of the four participating squads include European players who have won internationa...
docs.lead_paragraph: The semifinals of the Vanderbilt Knockout Team Championship here today at the American Contract Bridge League's Spring Nationals had an international flavor. Three of the four participating squads include European players who have won international titles. Lorenzo Lauria and Alfredo Versace of Italy are teamed with George Jacobs, Ralph Katz, Peter Weichsel and Alan Sontag. They face Adam Zmudzinski, Cezary Balicki, Marek Szymanowski and Krzysztof Martens of Poland, plus Grant Baze and Tipton Golias.
docs.abstract: Bridge column on semifinals of Vanderbile Knockout Team Championship in Vancouver (S)
